title: Crash analytics for Win32 Desktop apps
body: As per https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/projects/events/build/2017/dev-center-analytics-for-win32-developers?playlist=Dev-Center-Store-Services, the Dev center has support to monitor Crash reports for native win32 desktop apps without publishing into the store. But I couldn't find any option in my dev center account to support this functionality.
